draw.overall_supervision_plan: Lane OICs will continuously monitor all aspects of SQD LTX.  OICs, NCOICs, and Leaders will conduct checks for their respective unit and training as necessary.  Lane OICs, NCOICs, and Leaders will push accountability reports higher throughout the training period.  Real-world MEDEVAC and/or CASEVAC vehicle identified prior to the training event and located near the training element.  Driver and Medic/CLS briefed on routes, and strip maps with coordinates of AXP stored on vehicle.  Safety will be monitored from Lane OIC/NCOIC to Soldier and vice versa in order to ensure safe conduct of this Squad Life Fire Exercise.
